ygData.subject: Glowing Black Stone
ygData.msgSnippet: Getting to a level now where I would like to go find this item and I am looking for any information on getting the necro who carries it, Pyzgim (sp) to spawn
ygData.messageBody:
Getting to a level now where I would like to go find this item and I am
looking for any information on getting the necro who carries it, Pyzgim (sp)
to spawn in Q Hills. As I understand it, Tovax is the placeholder, but it is
it just luck and beating Tovax up repeatedly to get the other to spawn or is
something else involved ? I have only seen one of these since release and
would like to to take a few guildmembers out on a hunt for it.


Lozi ~Hand of Chaos~ CT
